quote: A new gamer who is interested in fighting games.

needsGoals.needs: A fun way to spend free time
needsGoals.situationsForNeeds: After a long day of work
needsGoals.goals: To have fun with friends and compete
needsGoals.challenges: Does not know the controls of the game and is very new
needsGoals.currentSolutions: In game controls and Wiki pages or YouTube

scenario: John is new to games and want to learn fighting games but has no ways to play it.

usp.benefits: Detailed information on combos and playstyles
usp.solutionsImpact: Teaches combos and helps the user improve at the game
